columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener.

columns.name: load_balancer_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the load balancer.

columns.name: port
columns.description: The port on which the load balancer is listening.

columns.name: protocol
columns.description: The protocol for connections from clients to the load balancer.

columns.name: ssl_policy
columns.description: The security policy that defines which protocols and ciphers are supported.

columns.name: alpn_policy
columns.description: The name of the Application-Layer Protocol Negotiation (ALPN) policy.

columns.name: certificates
columns.description: The default certificate for the listener.

columns.name: default_actions
columns.description: The default actions for the listener.
